root.name: The Experiment
root.description: OverviewExperiment 112 (also known as Experience 112) is an Adventure game revolving around a main character, Lea Nichols, who is guided by the player remotely. The player can flicker lights to alert Lea, open doors, and use any camera in the facility to help her progress through the labs of the Derelict. Links Official WebsiteBox art: In North America the box art was changed considerably, portraying a very different Lea, though the ingame character was unaffected.American CoverFrench Cover
